entry.title: 🔥🔥🔥🔥 Great opportunity here for a DAO member to bag some grant funding for their project from our good friends @AlgoveraAI 🫡 If you're ...
entry.summary:
🔥🔥🔥🔥 Great opportunity here for a DAO member to bag some grant funding for their project from our good friends @AlgoveraAI 🫡 If you're building already or have any ideas for #AI projects, check this out. $1,000 to the successful applicant. LFG 🤖 AlgoveraAI: Happy to share that we've partnered up with @developer_dao to set aside a $1k grant for a D_D member and their AI project🔥 Applications close on the 10th 🙌 Apply here 👇
Reach out to @wise_Tyy for any questions 🙏 https://forum.algovera.ai/c/proposals/round-8/15
